About This Game

All are connected to each other. We depend on high-tech novelties of the market, because only through them know what's going on in the world. But progress has a dark side. Our every action leaves a mark: every step, every stop, all that we like or do not like. And it's not just us. Megacities enmeshed in digital networks. Urban infrastructure is controlled and managed by a complex system. In Watch_DogsChikago submits Central Operating System (ctOS), namely it contains information on all residents. And the one who gets access to it, get control of the city. Aiden Pearce - a prominent hacker with a criminal record, whose actions have caused tragedy. To avenge his family , he goes on the warpath - and you along with it. Aiden is able to hack and use everything that is connected to the city information network - all that surrounds it . Access to security cameras, loading personal data , tracking the location of people , control traffic lights and public transport ... Chicago itself becomes your weapon. You just need to learn how to use it.

Features Of This Game

- Hack CITY
Watch_Dogs events occur in a carefully recreated Chicago , whose life can be controlled by a conventional smartphone. Switch the lights to the pursuers were stuck in a traffic jam . Hold the departing train and jump into it to break away from the chase. Spread the bridges to cut off the path . In a city where everything is connected , Central Operating System will be your assistant.

- STREET JUSTICE
Chicago has its own laws . Here to meet violence with violence, and you have enough strength and skill to adopt rules . Melee and shooting real as ever - realistic physics of the game to give odds to many representatives of the genre. Combine shooting and hacking to gain advantage in any situation. Local streets are designed so that you can implement your own plan of attack . To complete the picture you'll have a more than 30 types of weapons.

- Racing at high speed
The work on the game participated studio Ubisoft Reflection - creators of the series Driver. Move to Chicago can be behind the wheel of more than 65 different vehicles. Each of them is carefully modeled and behaves on the road to be accurate.

- Everything is under control
At the heart of Watch_Dogs is completely new , specially developed technology . You will find incredible graphics and authentic realism , your actions will affect the course of history and human life, and the consequences of decisions will diverge in the virtual world like ripples .

- Freedom of movement
In Watch_Dogs you can not only use the city's operating system for their own benefit , but also for yourself the street. Cut the way through the building or climb on the roof to hunt down the target.

- " Seamless " MULTIPLAYER
New level of interaction , cooperation and confrontation is achieved thanks to a new system of organization of multiplayer that combines single-player and multiplayer game together. No menus , no loading screens - only situational multiplayer shooter in an open world .

- Stay connected and play NEW
Treat yourself to an unforgettable experience with an auxiliary applications that extend the capabilities of the console. The innovative mobile platform will allow you to stay in touch with friends, even outside the home. Watch_Dogs helper application provides access to the possibility of using dual screen that allows you to play anytime and anywhere.
